storyInfo: Patriot asks W about Kazdel's past. And now, Hoederer has no choice but to go to Victoria to shake off his enemies. The lonesome W must now decide her own destiny.

attributes.content: Months ago, after contacting Reunion
10:14 PM \ Clear
Ursus, unnamed desert outskirts
...You’ve met all the Reunion leaders.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: What’d you think?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Are you asking me, or her?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: If you ask me, I’d say nothing out of the ordinary. The stuff they do is pretty par for the course for people like that.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: A strange bunch. There’s a child who seems to been purposefully pushed into that position to the point of becoming cruel, and then there’s a warrior whose toughness is beyond imagination.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: There are some incredible people, but then there are also some two-bit villains.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: All I can say is, we’ve seen all kinds of people after fighting wars all these years.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: But, there is someone who caught my eye...
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Oh, you must be talking about that one. The one who was waiting at the side with that other little rabbit.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Their squad seemed on a completely different level compared to those ordinary Infected. That kind of Sarkaz warrior can be said to truly bear the mark of war.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Sarkaz...?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Yeah, but you don’t see Sarkaz like that every day. He claims to be with Ursus, saying he broke off contact with Kazdel long ago.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: How pitiful. He never needed to live such an exhausting life.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Maybe we should all go meet him.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: The impression I got from him... was that he has become much more than a 'warrior.'
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: And you, don’t you love thinking about things? Instead of philosophizing, why not have a chat with someone like that?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: We might all learn a lot from him.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: You’re talking about...
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Pardon. I would like to. Speak with you alone.
...Speak of the devil. What's up?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: To who do I owe the pleasure?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: My name. Does not matter. For the time being.
Rest assured. Right now, I am not. Here on behalf of the leader.
I just want to hear...
About my countrymen. About my homeland. What has become of them.
I know that, in Kazdel. Many things happened.
Some things, I have heard. But details, no.
You’re just an Ursusian.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: These two identities. Do not conflict.
The bloodline. Has not changed. Dark, and deeply rooted.
I care not for it. But run from it? I cannot.
So even if I told you, what do you plan to do?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: These things happened a long time ago for me—
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Nothing. There is nothing. I can do.
But, it has been so long. Since I saw Theresa.
Ooh...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: From your reactions. I see. She is with you. Her mark is here. After all, you are Sarkaz.
Muddied. Blood-soaked.
She is a hero, at least. So respected. A great warrior. A worthy ruler.
My flesh. Loyal to Ursus. From my people, I exiled myself. But I, am still Sarkaz.
I want to know. What happened to her Kazdel.
I just, want to know.
En route to Chernobog
5:22 AM \ Clear
Chernobog, Sarkaz mercenary garrison
...Need something?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: We hope that your mercenaries can give us an explanation.
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: First, your team defected. The people who went after them reported back that you weren’t even trying.
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: A few hours ago, some enemies managed to infiltrate Chernobog. Again, due to your negligence.
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: Combined with the fact that when we first captured Chernobog, someone tipped us off that you let—
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: Okay, okay, I got it. The client’s dissatisfied with our performance. Can you say that with fewer words?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: We’re simply in a 'cooperative' relationship, and I’m the leader now. If I get on this table and start grovelling, will Talulah be happy?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Or, did having Papa Patriot around give you the illusion... that Reunion is actually good at fighting a war?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Make no mistake about who the people actually capable of bringing you victory are.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: If you’ve figured it out, hurry up and crawl back to that dragon girl. I’ll tell her what she wants to know soon enough, so don’t rush me.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: There’s one other thing.
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: Just now, stragglers from an enemy party were detected inside the city. That mercenary, Ines, died after exchanging fire with them.
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: Reunion also participated in this battle. The enemies were very strong, and we all suffered losses.
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: This is all due to your negligence.
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: ...There’s no need to get pushy with me.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Seems like something happened to the east of here not long ago.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Precisely.
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: So... where’s the body?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Unfortunately, I have bad news.
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: I’m talking about the enemy’s corpses. Ines wouldn’t use such flashy, destructive Arts.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Our casters were also involved in the battle. The entire street was destroyed.
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: Don’t you think you’re being a bit too blatant here?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I don’t know what you’re talking about.
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: ...So, from your side’s point of view, how should this situation be handled?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: ...Our main force is focused on the battle that will take place in Lungmen. We have no time to waste here.
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: The Leader won’t investigate your responsibility in this just yet, so you should handle it yourself.
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: Hmm... You have a pretty thick Ursus accent.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: ...What of it?
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: You guys...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: ...Didn’t really think that I’d take some random excuse, did you?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: W, stop.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: (Put that wand away and calm down first.)
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Sorry, got a bit carried away there. You can breathe a sigh of relief first and be grateful that you get to live.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: What’s the meaning of this?!
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: ...Don’t get me wrong. The death of one Sarkaz won’t affect the outcome of the next battle.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: And neither will the death of the entire Reunion Movement.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: If you don’t believe me, you’re welcome to try me.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: ...I’ll make sure our Leader hears about your true attitude.
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: There won’t be a next time.
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: You heard ‘em.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Since you let that Rhodes Island squad escape, Reunion has never allowed us to act alone.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: If they could put half this much effort into their actual battles, they wouldn’t be getting their asses handed to them so badly.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Despite that, you still deliberately let that traitorous blademaster get away.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: ...I didn’t deliberately let him go. I just didn’t want those idiotic Infected to kill a Sarkaz I brought here.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: ...The old you would’ve slaughtered Flamebringer on the spot to get Reunion’s attention off of you.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Regardless of what you wanted.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Eh? Was I the only one who couldn’t remember his codename? How embarrassing.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: So, is Ines really...
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Now’s not the time...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: She... I’ll have someone identify her, identify her c— ...Tch.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Let’s talk business first.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: ...Three things.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: First, Ines wanted to warn you that something’s wrong with Talulah. She must’ve seen something more specific, but I’m not clear on that.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: All she told me was, Talulah apparently had 'two shadows.' From her reaction, this isn’t some common byproduct of Arts interference.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: That damn coward... Why wouldn’t she ever be straightforward...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Second, the old man has left. Received an order to go fetch something. Talulah didn’t even make any efforts to hide it.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: ...Finally, a messenger has already set off for Victoria. Shortly, the Regent will know everything that has happened here.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Theresis knows many things, and he has just as many monsters around him.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: If he is allowed to intervene, this would no longer be a simple question between Reunion and Ursus...
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: W! Are you listening to me?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: ...Too noisy. Since it’s all good news anyway, let me have some peace and quiet.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You’ve had your hand on the hilt of your blade... ever since you walked through the door.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You were like that when we first met, as if you were ready to cut me down at any moment.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: But the way you stayed calm back there was just like Patriot—
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: What do you really think about this?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: That’s not important.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: And none of us are. We all know this, and bad habits die hard.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Ines, she...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I have the right to hear what she said, right? ...In order to respect her sacrifice.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: ...You two are both similar. Never considering the consequences of the things you do.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: The Regent will not sit idly and watch them lose control. If you can’t give him a suitable answer, Londinium’s summons will destroy everything you’ve painstakingly put together.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Ironically, I still don’t know what you’re trying to accomplish, even now.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: ...Who knows?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Just, don’t think you can handle everything alone, W. You’ll come to regret it sooner or later, just like me.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: The reason you have the right to ask questions is because you avoided the center of the whirlpool.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Really? Who’s still left on Rhodes Island now?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: ...Why are you asking that?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I’ve seen your interactions with the messenger. You’ve been investigating Rhodes Island’s trail.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: That drug company... I had assumed they only got caught up in that war, but turns out, the truth isn’t so simple.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Especially, Scout...
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: ...According to your plan, we were in charge of all the other fronts during the battle to hold Chernobog.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Yeah, and you guys did a great job—
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: But, someone still found him, the ghost of Babel. You chose to find him yourself, and then you let him go.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: In the past, I would’ve seen this as a sign of untrustworthiness.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: But by the looks of things, you didn’t plan to keep that secret for long anyway.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Ugh, what point is there in hiding that?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: If you’ve ever fought in a battle, you’re bound to know some people who have a bit of a reputation.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: After all, if those people have been fighting tooth and nail to hang on, there’s no getting around it.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: What’s your plan now? We shouldn’t have had to fight against them in the first place.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: If that Kal'tsit is still in charge of Rhodes Island,  this might be a chance...
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: What do you think my objective is?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: ...I see.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: You said you’d help me do this one thing. We agreed on it.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Dishonest mercenaries are worth just as much as dead mercenaries, so I don’t mind making some extra arrangements.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Ines can no longer help you.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: And soon... I’ll have to leave too.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Oh, I haven’t heard about this before. Where to?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I’ll head back to Victoria with the messenger. It’ll be about a three or four-month trip. We’ll leave tomorrow morning before sunrise.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: ...Are you in that much of a hurry to reunite with Ines in death? With your reputation, you plan to head back to Londinium carrying all that sin on your shoulders?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You’d probably be better off fleeing back to Kazdel.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You killed Garcin and reorganized the mercenaries. Someone has to report this to the Regent.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: If nobody goes to report this, he’ll treat us like disowned children and cast us straight into the next warzone. A battlefield within his reach.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: When that time comes, there really will be no place to run.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: You’re taking this risk to cover for me? Why would you do that?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Her Majesty, Theresa... She remembered my name. And my family.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Though Her Majesty is no longer here, there’s a part of her left in this piece of shit, no good squad.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: How come I’ve never seen it?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Mm. No matter how perverse the Sarkaz’s personalities and methods may be, judging from the results, they’re still fighting for that lofty, unrealistic idea.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: ...Do you even know what you’re talking about?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: We’ve known each other for a long time, W.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: That’s all.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Out of compassion, let me also give you a reminder.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: This is your best opportunity to escape Kazdel. Leave from here, past Lungmen and Ursus, to the distant lands beyond. I’m willing to keep one eye closed.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: But if you go back, know that you will die.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Hah... Just earlier, you said you wanted me to help you do your thing.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: If your idea of helping me is just committing suicide, then I suggest you hang on to your life instead.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: When it’s my turn to collect, I’d like some of my debtors to still be alive.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I wouldn’t necessarily be going there to die. Depending on the Regent’s mood, there are many possible outcomes.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Reunion has been manipulated into something far beyond what you can imagine. The Regent may well change his mind.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: ...In any case, I no longer have the luxury of running away.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: I’ve left Kazdel. And I’m about to leave here. What’s the worst that could happen? Patriot has already taught me enough.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: You’ve been influenced by him a lot, just from your short time here.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Just like you were, with Theresa. It’s all the same, isn’t it?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Theresis sits on his throne. Even if I am only able to grovel my way up there with my head pressed against the ground, I must reach where he is, and figure out what he is thinking.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Otherwise, if we continue acting recklessly as we are now, that will truly be committing suicide.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: You know, you could also just submit to him.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I’ve thought about that before. Just so you know, Garcin was always suspicious of you. He even gave me the order to kill you once.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Oh? Sounds like things would’ve been a bit more entertaining if you had listened to him.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Sorry, but I’m not into the same kind of stuff you’re into.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Now, let’s decide.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Hm... I won’t deny that I’m curious about what Theresis is up to.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Seems like I have no choice though.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: That’s right. Even if you rejected my proposal, I don’t plan to let you keep running the show.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: You’re not gonna say that this is for my good, right?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Of course not. What kind of Sarkaz goes around taking care of others?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: ...How disappointing, you’ve just gone right back to your old ways. I thought you were going to keep falling.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: So, do you already have a plan?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Why don’t you go ask Ines?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: That’s a really unfunny joke.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Then, before I leave, let me tell you another joke.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Ines once told me that you looked more and more like a lunatic, but your actions got less and less decisive.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Who, me? Do you really believe that?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Have I been using fewer bombs recently?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Maybe. No matter how good you might be at hiding it, we’ve worked together for far too many years.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Who’s to say, maybe we trusted you this whole time.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: ...So, which line was the joke?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: ...Oh, it’s you. Sarkaz mercenary, Hoederer, huh?
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: I heard you were leaving. What business do you have with us?
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: Before I leave, there’s something I’d like to confirm...
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Did any of you personally see Ines fall in battle?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: As soon as we received the support request, the battle was over.
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: The street had been torn apart, and the Originium crystals left by the Catastrophe caused a violent chain reaction.
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: We got the situation under control with fairly minimal—
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: ...What are you doing?
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: Ursursian, you’re pretty calm for someone who just saw a companion fall in front of your eyes.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: You give off the stench of conspiracy and war. A stench that is all too familiar—
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: If Ines was still here, that’s definitely what she’d say.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: So that’s what this is about. It’s all too common for people to vent their anger on the Infected over a fallen comrade.
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: I just thought you would’ve been a little smarter than W.
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: ...A little smarter, huh?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Yeah, looking back, I’ve been a bit overprotective of her. Always have been.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: But not because I was afraid she’d get in trouble. You see, I was more afraid that I’d have nobody to kill.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: After all, I’m also a Sarkaz... the real deal.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: You——!
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier
